fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 The Rose and Crown (0870 609 6163; www.corushotels.com) in Salisbury offers a two-night stay any time from 24 March until 8 May. The hotel offers a double or twin room for £45pp per night. Under £200 With spring on the way, Leger Holidays (0845 458 5599; www.legerbreaks.info) has a four-day break in Holland for the bulbfields. From £129pp for accommodation, breakfast, a visit to Amsterdam Keukenhof Park and return channel crossings. Under £700 Get sporty this spring with a school holiday volunteer project in Bangalore, India. Prices are from £695pp for four weeks including food, accommodation and insurance with i-i (0870 429 4227; www.i-to-isports.com) Under £800 Spa and fun for all the family at Le Palais de la Mediterranee in Nice for Easter. Carrier (01625 547050; www.carrier.co.uk) offers three nights from £720pp, including flights and private transfers. Children under 12 from £125pp. Under £900 Fourteen nights of bliss for the price of seven at the boutique Jamaica Inn and Spa in Ochos Rios from £899pp, including flights, with Key2Holidays (020 7749 3634; www.key2holidays.co.uk). Under £1,100 California dreaming on a coast cruise departing 7 April. Fourteen nights on the five-star Celebrity Mercury, with a stay in Las Vegas. The price is £1,099pp including flights with Cruise Classified (020 8515 4650; www.cruiseclassified.com).
